column4: every time I hit Alt-[Left Arrow] in Firefox the browser successfully goes "back" as expected but like clockwork Ubuntu's "Type Your Command" dialog pops up and take focus. I'm on a laptop with the world crappiest trackpad. Who should I bring this issue to: Mozilla or Ubuntu?
omg, lol Lotus 123 for the win ...
yeah this was in the days when we thought we made a big score by getting a PC clone with a 20 MB HD for $350
yeah, offtopic but fun walk down memory lane. :-) Well back to Ubuntu...
